qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, what were the recorded temperatures of patients I. Thomas and K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital, patient I. Thomas had a recorded temperature of 38.5°C. According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. Ramos also had a recorded temperature of 38.5°C.

content: Ear discharge, hearing loss, and severe headache for 2 weeks
Severe bone pain and difficulty in walking for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital, patient I. Thomas's chief complaint was ear discharge, hearing loss, and severe headache for 2 weeks. According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. Ramos's chief complaint was severe bone pain and difficulty in walking for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, what were the preliminary diagnoses for patients I. Thomas and K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital, patient I. Thomas was preliminarily diagnosed with Chronic Otitis Media with mastoiditis. According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, what are the ages of patients I. Thomas and K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital, patient I. Thomas is 10 years old. According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. Ramos is 82 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, what are the genders of patients I. Thomas and K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital, patient I. Thomas is male. According to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. Ramos is female.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, I. Thomas or K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: I. Thomas was admitted on December 24th, and K. Ramos was admitted on October 26th. K. Ramos was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, whose temperature was higher upon admission, I. Thomas or K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: Both I. Thomas and K. Ramos had a temperature of 38.5°C upon admission.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Bridgewater General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, whose pulse rate was higher upon admission, I. Thomas or K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: I. Thomas had a pulse rate of 100 bpm, while K. Ramos had a pulse rate of 88 bpm. I. Thomas's pulse rate was higher.
